pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau congratulates Prime Minister Paolo Gentiloni of Italy | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau called Prime Minister Paolo Gentiloni of Italy today to congratulate him on his confirmation as Prime Minister.

The two leaders reaffirmed the rich and diverse bilateral relationship between Canada and Italy which is built and maintained through strong people-to-people ties and common values.

Prime Minister Trudeau emphasized that he looked forward to working closely with Prime Minister Gentiloni to ensure the ongoing stability and prosperity for citizens of both countries.
